subject: Sharing our research
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Well, our main goal here is to research and share. It looks like our sharing is having a big impact, with a major player in the field of paranormal helping us to share our research.
Stephen Wagner writes about Paranormal Phenomena for the very popular website, About.com. In an article he wrote yesterday, he tells his readers about the Radio Shack Hack. Steve even went out and bought a 12-470 and hacked it!
Read his article here: http://paranormal.about.com/b/2007/12/13/a-ghost-box-for-under-100.htm
